title: 30 min Morning Yoga - Yoga at Home to FEEL GREAT
description:
Start your day with this 30 minute intermediate vinyasa flow full body yoga class.
❤️ Try my mobile app to get exclusive content! ❤️📱 👉 http://bit.ly/ytmobileapp
🛍️ SHOP MY MERCHANDISE, BOOKS & ONLINE COURSES 🧘👉 https://bit.ly/ywkshop

Rise and shine, it's time to get on your mat and flow with me! I've got a lovely 30 minute morning yoga practice to help wake you up and energize you for the day ahead. This intermediate vinyasa yoga class provides a great balance between flexibility and strength.

I originally shared this sequence on Instagram and after receiving many requests to film it, I finally got around to it! I hope you enjoy it :) (PS - follow me on Instagram here  https://instagram.com/yoga_with_kassandra)

No props are needed in this class and we'll go through poses like deer, laying triangle, forearm cat/cow, reverse low lunge, humble warrior and lizard pose. This is an all around great full body yoga class that will help you set the tone for the rest of your day.

😍 MORE MORNING YOGA 😍👉 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLW0v0k7UCVrmvckKAZJVyeLPFKjYYnu9M

✅ SUBSCRIBE TO SUPPORT FREE YOGA ON THE INTERNET  http://bit.ly/ywkassandra
🔔 Don’t forget to click on the bell to turn on post notifications!

Thanks for watching,
Kassandra

comments: Good morning everyone! Come follow me on Instagram for more flows :) https://instagram.com/yoga_with_kassandra
I love Cassandras yoga routine. They are dynamic enough to really feel a difference but relaxing and calming. She is the best.
I have been practicing this 30 minutes yoga since I got laid off from job a month ago. It helps me relaxed and focused and  huge benefit for my pelvic pain. Thanks

Hello Kassandra, I have been practicing yoga for 10 years, and I think this is the best practice I have ever done! I feel so much calmer and grounded and ready to face some of the challenges that are in my day today. Thank you so much.
Your descriptions are so accurate that I can do this with my eyes closed. Thx
